attributes.action: Arrange for the cost of repairs to C of E church buildings to be reimbursed to help preserve our archeological & historic heritage for the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Churches are a valuable part of our heritage and a major tourist attraction, yet the funding of repairs is left to the parish in which the building is situated. Thus the cost of maintaining a national asset is left to the minority.  This is grossly unfair and should be rectified.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Arrange for the cost of repairs to C of E church buildings to be reimbursed to help preserve our archeological & historic heritage for the future."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12796.asp
